titles.title: Home Office Tax Simplification Act of 2002
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a minimum deduction for business use of a home, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/25/2002--Introduced. Home Office Tax Simplification Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to set a minimum deduction of $2,500 for the business use (or rental of) of a dwelling unit.Repeals the requirement of a depreciation recapture on the sale of a principal residence.
